publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4987 Dr Elaine Murray: A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland—That the Parliament notes the recent document produced by the BioIndustry Association Scotland, entitled Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland, which sets out key recommendations for all Scotland’s political parties to follow in order to create a healthier and more prosperous Scotland; recognises that the life sciences sector is a success for Scotland, with 592 companies and institutions employing over 20,700 people and contributing over £800 million per annum to the Scottish economy; appreciates that the sector is highly competitive and that the right conditions are important for the sector to grow and for such important jobs to stay here, and considers that the Scottish Executive should support this manifesto in order to continue the success of life sciences as part of a thriving Scottish economy and to realise the human healthcare benefits that life sciences promise.

S2M-4987 Dr Elaine Murray: A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland—That the Parliament notes the recent document produced by the BioIndustry Association Scotland, entitled Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland, which sets out key recommendations for all Scotland’s political parties to follow in order to create a healthier and more prosperous Scotland; recognises that the life sciences sector is a success for Scotland, with 592 companies and institutions employing over 20,700 people and contributing over £800 million per annum to the Scottish economy; appreciates that the sector is highly competitive and that the right conditions are important for the sector to grow and for such important jobs to stay here, and considers that the Scottish Executive should support this manifesto in order to continue the success of life sciences as part of a thriving Scottish economy and to realise the human healthcare benefits that life sciences promise.
S2M-4987 A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland (lodged on 23 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-4987 A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland (lodged on 23 October 2006) John Home Robertson*, Cathie Craigie*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Alex Neil*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mike Pringle*, Bristow Muldoon*, Euan Robson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Christine May*, Bruce Crawford*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Trish Godman*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4987 A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland (lodged on 23 October 2006) Brian Adam*, Murray Tosh*, Kate Maclean*, Shona Robison*
S2M-4987 A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland (lodged on 23 October 2006) Mrs Mary Mulligan*
S2M-4987 A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland (lodged on 23 October 2006) Scott Barrie*
S2M-4987 A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland (lodged on 23 October 2006) Helen Eadie*
S2M-4987 A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland (lodged on 23 October 2006) Robin Harper*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-4987 A Manifesto for Life Sciences in Scotland (lodged on 23 October 2006) Linda Fabiani*
